In a message dated 9/8/01 4:05:24 AM Pacific Daylight Time, 
cyberwolf4@... writes:

<< I have a question, without Iron Raptor or Prowl active, who's gonna be
 acting leader at Maximal city? I'd gladly take over but the only one I have
 anywhere near is Ice. She's not the best choice but If theres no other
 options I'll do it. >>

(Normally I'd say Yan's Kluster, but I don't know if Kluster's dead or not 
and besides Yan is out because he hurt his poor wittle hand :)  Hey, I got 
some point metal thing jammed into my hand and it locked up yesterday, but I 
still live.  Of course, it's not bothering me at all now :)  Back on track 
though, next I 'd say Chordate, but he's going to die soon.

I don't think there was really a chain of command afterwards, so if no one 
else objects, I'd have to agree with Cyberwolf taking over command of the 
Maximals)
